14// EVENT THREAD IMPLEMENTATION
15
16logging::logger log_task =
17 {.name = "EV_TASK", .on = true, .min_level = logging::INFO};
18logging::logger log_ctrl =
19 {.name = "EV_CTRL", .on = true, .min_level = logging::ERROR};
20
21cydui::threading::thread_t* event_thread;
22struct thread_data {
23 bool pending = false;
24 std::deque<cydui::events::Event*>* event_queue =
25 new std::deque<cydui::events::Event*>;
26 std::unordered_map<
27 str,
28 std::deque<cydui::events::listener_t*>
29 >* event_listeners =
30 new std::unordered_map<str, std::deque<cydui::events::listener_t*>>;
31
32 std::unordered_map<str, cydui::events::Event*>* state_events =
33 new std::unordered_map<str, cydui::events::Event*>;
34};
35static thread_data* th_data = new thread_data;
36
37
38std::mutex event_mutex;
39std::mutex listeners_mutex;
40
41
42static void run_event(thread_data* data, cydui::events::Event* ev) {
43 ev->ev_mtx.lock();
44 ev->status = cydui::events::PROCESSING;
45 ev->ev_mtx.unlock();
46 listeners_mutex.lock();
47 if (data->event_listeners->contains(ev->type)) {
48 auto size_before = (*data->event_listeners)[ev->type].size();
49 for (const auto listener: (*data->event_listeners)[ev->type]) {
50 listener->operator()(ev);
58 if ((*data->event_listeners)[ev->type].size() != size_before) {
59 break;
60 }
61 }
62 }
63 listeners_mutex.unlock();
64}
65
66void push_event(thread_data* data, cydui::events::Event* ev) {
67 event_mutex.lock();
68 data->event_queue->push_back(ev);
69 data->pending = true;
70 log_task.debug("NEW EVENT: %s", ev->type.c_str());
71 event_mutex.unlock();
72}
73
74cydui::events::Event* get_next_event(thread_data* data) {
75 cydui::events::Event* ev = nullptr;
76
77 //event_mutex.lock();
78 if (data->pending) {
79 // log_task.info("EV QUEUE: %d", data->event_queue->size());
80 ev = data->event_queue->front();
81 }
82 //event_mutex.unlock();
83
84 return ev;
85}
86
87void clean_up_event(thread_data* data, cydui::events::Event* ev) {
88 event_mutex.lock();
89 data->event_queue->pop_front();
90 if (data->event_queue->empty())
91 data->pending = false;
92 ev->ev_mtx.lock();
93 ev->status = cydui::events::CONSUMED;
94 ev->ev_mtx.unlock();
95 log_task.debug("DONE WITH EVENT: %s %s", ev->type.c_str(), ev->managed ? "" : "[deleting]");
96 if (!ev->managed) delete ev;
97 event_mutex.unlock();
98}
99
100void process_event(thread_data* data) {
101 // log_task.debug("Processing next event");
102
103 log_task.debug("EVENT COUNT: %ld", data->event_queue->size());
104 cydui::events::Event* ev = get_next_event(data);
105
106 if (ev != nullptr) {
107 run_event(data, ev);
108 clean_up_event(data, ev);
109 }
110}
111
112using namespace std::chrono_literals;
113
114void event_task(cydui::threading::thread_t* this_thread) {
115 log_task.debug("Started event_task");
116 auto t0 = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
117 while (this_thread->running) {
118 t0 = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
119 process_event((thread_data*) (this_thread->data));
120 std::this_thread::sleep_until(t0 + 100us);
121 }
122}
123
124// EVENTS API
125void cydui::events::start() {
126 if (event_thread && event_thread->native_thread != nullptr)
127 return;
128 log_ctrl.debug("Starting event_thread");
129
130 event_thread =
131 threading::new_thread(&event_task, th_data)
132 ->set_name("EV_THD");
133}
134
135void cydui::events::emit_raw(cydui::events::Event* ev) {
136 push_event(th_data, ev);
137}
138
139void cydui::events::emit_raw(const str &event_type, void* data, std::function<void()> data_destructor) {
140 auto* ev = new cydui::events::Event {
141 .type = event_type,
142 .ev = data,
143 .ev_destructor = std::move(data_destructor),
144 };
145
146 push_event(th_data, ev);
147}
148
149cydui::events::listener_t* cydui::events::on_event_raw(const str &event_type, const Listener &c) {
150 if (!th_data->event_listeners->contains(event_type))
151 (*th_data->event_listeners).insert({event_type, {}});
152 auto* l = new listener_t {event_type, c};
153 (*th_data->event_listeners)[event_type].push_back(l);
154 return l;
155}
156
157void cydui::events::remove_listener(const str &event_type, const listener_t &listener) {
158 if (listener.get_id() == 0) return;
159 if (th_data->event_listeners->contains(event_type)) {
160 for (auto l = (*th_data->event_listeners)[event_type].begin(); l != (*th_data->event_listeners)[event_type].end(); l++) {
161 if ((*l)->get_id() == listener.get_id()) {
162 (*th_data->event_listeners)[event_type].erase(l);
163 break;
164 }
165 }
166 }
167}
